item.title: 消费增长超预期，中国经济趋于稳定
item.description: 上个月，中国经济出现企稳迹象，零售额增幅创八个月来新高，这表明中国政府最新一轮的经济刺激政策推动了一些关键行业的发展。【原文：China’s economy showed signs of stabilization last month, buoyed by the highest retail sales growth in eight months and indicating Beijing’s latest round of stimulus has boosted some key sectors.】

item.title: 7 万亿美元现金堆不断扩大，令华尔街怀疑论者望而却步
item.description: 今年本应是货币市场大逃亡的一年。【原文：It was supposed to be the year of the great money-market exodus.】

item.title: 刺激经济后中国房价降速放缓
item.description: 在中国近期政策支持的帮助下，10 月份中国房价降幅连续第二个月收窄。【原文：China’s home-price declines abated for a second month in October, aided by the country’s recent policy support.】

item.title: 小米、Xpeng 和 Nio 报告，特朗普获胜有望带来令人震惊的关税
item.description: 小米公司、新鹏公司和 Nio 公司下周将公布财报，唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫将对这些中国科技和电动汽车公司意味着什么将成为各方关注的焦点。【原文：Xiaomi Corp., Xpeng Inc. and Nio Inc. report earnings next week with all attention on what Donald Trump’s return to the White House will mean for the Chinese tech and electric vehicles firms.】

item.title: 印度储蓄银行寻求 12.5 亿美元的 2024 年印度最大银行贷款
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度国家银行计划借款 12.5 亿美元，这将是印度金融业今年最大的一笔美元贷款。【原文：State Bank of India plans to borrow up to $1.25 billion, in what would be the largest dollar-denominated loan from the country’s financial sector this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔就 5G 招标人选接受审查
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）领导的政府将建设该国第二个 5G 网络的招标授予了电信行业中最小的一家公司，从而遭到了批评。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim’s government faces criticism after it awarded a tender to build the country’s second 5G network to one of the smallest players in the telecommunications industry.】

item.title: 亿万富豪投资者称 "买下 "中国的 "一切 "后削减阿里巴巴股份
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者戴维-泰珀（David Tepper）最近表示，在中国政府的刺激经济大潮中，他将购买 "一切 "与中国有关的投资，结果他在第三季度削减了在电子商务巨头阿里巴巴集团（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）的投资。【原文：Turns out that Billionaire investor David Tepper, who said recently he would buy “everything” China-related amid Beijing’s stimulus blitz, trimmed exposure in e-commerce giant Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. in the third quarter.】

item.title: Xero 首席执行官卡西迪推动增长议程，利润有望增长 70
item.description: 为小型企业提供会计软件的 Xero Ltd.公司首席执行官苏克辛德-辛格-卡西迪（Sukhinder Singh Cassidy）说，随着各国推动薪资和税务等功能的数字化，该公司看到了进一步增长的机会。【原文：Xero Ltd., which offers accounting software for small businesses, sees opportunities for further growth as countries push the digitization of functions such as payroll and tax, Chief Executive Officer Sukhinder Singh Cassidy said.】

item.title: 石破计划采取财政刺激措施，日本经济增长放缓
item.description: 日本第三季度经济增长放缓，为政府在本月晚些时候出台刺激计划提供了更多理由。【原文：Japan’s economic growth slowed in the third quarter, boosting the case for the government to put together a stimulus package to be unveiled later this month.】

item.title: 鲍威尔旗帜鲜明地限制降息，黄金维持在两个月低点附近
item.description: 在美元持续走强的情况下，黄金维持在两个月低点附近，在杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的言论强调了美国经济的韧性之后，交易员们对美联储下月降息的预期逐渐减弱。【原文：Gold held near a two-month low amid persistent strength in the dollar, with traders winding back expectations for a Federal Reserve rate cut next month after comments from Jerome Powell underscored resilience in the US economy.】

item.title: 联想集团利润超出预期，本季度个人电脑销售形势严峻
item.description: 联想集团有限公司（Lenovo Group Ltd.）公布的利润好于预期，原因是在整个行业业绩下滑的季度里，该公司的个人电脑出货量表现优于同行。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd. posted better-than-expected profit as its PC shipments outperformed peers in a down quarter for the wider industry.】

item.title: 石油供应过剩担忧和美元贬值导致油价每周下跌
item.description: 受美元走强的影响，以及对明年全球市场将出现供应过剩的担忧，石油价格每周下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a weekly drop, weighed down by the impact of a stronger dollar and concerns the global market will flip to a glut next year.】

item.title: 自动驾驶初创公司 Pony.ai 在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 1.95 亿美元的投资
item.description: Pony.ai 公司希望在美国首次公开募股中募集多达 1.95 亿美元的资金，因为与汽车相关的公司引领了中国上市热潮。【原文：Pony.ai Inc. is looking to raise as much as $195 million from its US initial public offering as automotive-related companies lead a modest pickup in Chinese listings.】

item.description:
上海街头巷尾的股票沙龙人潮涌动，显示投机炒作愈演愈烈。

The swelling crowds at Shanghai’s street corner stock salon show rampant speculation is on the rise.

item.title: 主要投资者在 Sohn Australia 会议上表示将投资这些股票
item.description: IFM Investors 基金经理里基-班南（Rikki Bannan）将企业旅游管理有限公司（Corporate Travel Management Ltd.）列为她的首选股票，为周五在阿德莱德举行的 Sohn Australia 年度会议拉开了序幕。【原文：IFM Investors fund manager Rikki Bannan named Corporate Travel Management Ltd. as her top stock pick to kick off the annual Sohn Australia conference in Adelaide on Friday.】

item.title: 必和必拓首席执行官表示，铜需求飙升将有助于推动企业合并
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd. ）首席执行官迈克-亨利（Mike Henry）表示，未来十年铜需求的飙升将需要 2500 亿美元的投资，这将有助于推动该行业的进一步兼并。首席执行官迈克-亨利（Mike Henry）说。【原文：Soaring demand for copper will require $250 billion of investment over the next decade, helping to drive further mergers in the industry, BHP Group Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Mike Henry said.】

item.title: 新西兰制造业连续 20 个月收缩
item.description: 新西兰制造业连续第20个月出现创纪录的萎缩，进一步表明经济需要进一步刺激才能恢复增长。【原文：New Zealand’s manufacturing industry contracted for a record 20th consecutive month, reinforcing signs the economy will need further stimulus to get back up to speed.】

item.title: 愤怒的法官质疑洋葱公司竞购 Infowars 的透明度
item.description: 一位沮丧的破产法官表示，他对讽刺新闻网站洋葱（The Onion）赢得右翼挑衅者亚历克斯-琼斯（Alex Jones）的 Infowars 网站拍卖的过程表示担忧。【原文：A frustrated bankruptcy judge said he has concerns over the process in which satirical news site The Onion won an auction for right-wing provocateur Alex Jones’ Infowars website.】

item.title: 美联储 12 月减息成疑，美元上涨：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周五早盘将攀升，尽管交易员们缩减了对美联储下月降息的预期，这拖累了美国股市，并使美元走强。【原文：Asian equities were set to climb early Friday even as traders scaled back expectations for a Federal Reserve rate cut next month which weighed on US stocks and strengthened the dollar.】

item.title: 富兰克林将整合 Wamco 的部分业务，在资金外流的情况下裁员
item.description: 富兰克林资源公司（Franklin Resources Inc）将开始接管其 Western Asset Management Co.【原文：Franklin Resources Inc. will start taking over parts of its Western Asset Management Co. unit as the bond house grapples with a Securities and Exchange Commission investigation into its star bond manager, Ken Leech.】

item.title: 穆迪因宪法改革下调墨西哥信用展望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将墨西哥的信用前景从稳定下调至负面，称最近的宪法改革有可能损害这个拉丁美洲第二大经济体。【原文：Mexico’s credit outlook was lowered to negative from stable by Moody’s Ratings, which said recent constitutional changes risk hurting Latin America’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 中国发动新贸易战的不对称工具蕴含全球风险
item.description: 面对与美国再次发生贸易冲突的前景，中国拥有了新的力量，近年来其报复范围不断扩大，包括能够对全球商业和金融造成严重破坏的工具。【原文：China wields new powers as it confronts the prospect of another trade conflict with the US, expanding its retaliatory reach in recent years to include tools capable of wreaking havoc on global commerce and finance.】

item.title: 迈克尔-伯利增持中国股票，但谨慎规避风险
item.description: 迈克尔-伯利（Michael Burry）是因 2008 年押注美国房地产市场而闻名的对冲基金经理，随着中国政府推出刺激政策，他在第三季度进一步增持了包括阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holdings Ltd. ）在内的中国股票，但同时也增加了新的看跌期权，以提供下行保护。【原文：Michael Burry, the hedge fund manager famous for his 2008 bet against the US housing market, further increased his exposures in China stocks including Alibaba Group Holdings Ltd. in the third quarter as Beijing rolled out a stimulus blitz, but also added new bearish options that would provide downside protection.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司收购多米诺比萨、Pool Corp.
item.description: 由于董事长沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）削减了一些长期持有的投资，伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.这两家新公司的股票在纽约尾盘交易中跳涨。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. bought stock in Domino’s Pizza Inc. and Pool Corp. during the third quarter as Chairman Warren Buffett cut back on some long-held investments. Shares of the two new holdings jumped in late New York trading.】

item.title: 计算机语言 Basic 的共同创造者托马斯-库尔茨逝世，享年 96 岁
item.description: 托马斯-库尔茨（Thomas E. Kurtz）逝世，他是达特茅斯学院的教授，在 20 世纪 60 年代与他人共同创建了新手友好型计算机代码 Basic，并在个人计算机兴起期间帮助使其成为程序员的行业标准。享年 96 岁。【原文：Thomas E. Kurtz, a Dartmouth College professor who co-created the novice-friendly computer code known as Basic during the 1960s and helped make it the industry standard for programmers during the rise of personal computing, has died. He was 96.】

item.title: 投资跟不上，加拿大基础设施不断老化
item.description: 随着基础设施投资的放缓，加拿大的高速公路、购物中心、学校和设备正在老化而得不到更换。【原文：Canada’s highways, shopping centers, schools and equipment are aging without being replaced as investment in infrastructure slows.】

item.title: 应用材料公司预测引发芯片支出担忧
item.description: 美国最大的芯片制造设备制造商应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：Applied Materials Inc., the largest US maker of chip-manufacturing equipment, gave a disappointing revenue forecast, signaling that some semiconductor customers may be holding off on orders.】

item.title: 美国将韩国列入外汇监控观察名单
item.description: 美国财政部将韩国列入外汇行为 "监控名单"，该名单继续包括日本和德国，并再次批评中国在货币管理方面缺乏透明度。【原文：The US Treasury added South Korea to a “monitoring list” for foreign-exchange practices that continues to include Japan and Germany, and reiterated its criticism of China’s lack of transparency with regard to managing its currency.】

item.title: 乌拉圭将关键利率维持在 8.5%，以巩固通胀放缓态势
item.description: 乌拉圭周四将关键利率稳定在 8.5%，以确保通胀和通胀预期继续向目标区间的中点放缓。【原文：Uruguay held its key interest rate steady at 8.5% on Thursday to ensure that inflation and inflation expectations continue to slow toward the midpoint of the target range.】
